page.syntax: Formatted_Date as C = SQL_Date(* date [,N option [,N option2 ]])
page.description: Takes a date or time value and returns a character date or date-time string using the format for Alpha Portable SQL - {yyyy-mm-dd}
page.discussion: The SQL_DATE() function generates a character string with the format: {YYYY-MM-DD}.
